doc.title: Oi joi yue lok guen dik yat ji
doc.plot: What happens when several pretty, young HK girls share the same dream- to be a superstar in Asia's answer to Hollywood? Different characters and different fates lead them to separate destinies. One accepts a mediocre marriage after an unrealistic, though fascinating love. One has an affair, though she lives a material life. Another one realizes true heart is hard to find after she stumbles and falls in love with a man, as well as a lesbian. The results are several different interpretations of the same dream. HK film buffs will recognize the characters as thinly-disguised satires on a number of real-life HK actresses/tabloid celebrities.
